text: @NYGovCuomo Split the vent. https://t.co/XjRi7hgGYo provides a 3D printable ventilator circuit splitter. This is a last resort, emergency-only device when faced with a critical shortage of ventilators. #StandTogether #COVID19 #VentSplitter #VentilatorShortage
